## DateApiObject.diffDays() method

Gets number of days between this and provided date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
diffDays(date: TDate): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | TDate | Date which is used for computation of diff against |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
